testFailInvestWithInvalidSignature().details: defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, changes a param and should fail to invest

testInvalidateFalseSignature().details: defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, and validates it with different struct parameters

testInvest().details: defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, validates it, and invests some PaymentToken

testMultipleInvestmentsInSingleRound().details: in generateInvestParamsWithSignature, the user is allocated 1000 tokens, and the round limit is 10000 tokensso 10 investments work, but 11 won't

testTooManyInvestmentsInSingleRound().details: in generateInvestParamsWithSignature, the user is allocated 1000 tokens, and the round limit is 10000 tokensso 10 investments work, but 11 won't

testValidateSignature().details: defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, and validates it with the same struct parameters

setUp().notice: sets up project and payment tokens, and an instance of the investment ledger

testAdminAddInvestmentRecord().notice: Tests addition of investment record by admin

testEmitVCInvestmentAdmin().notice: Tests emission of VCInvestment event upon admin investment

testEmitVCInvestmentUser().notice: Tests emission of VCInvestment event upon user investment

testFailInvestWithInvalidSignature().notice: Tests investment function call by user with invalid signature

testInvalidateFalseSignature().notice: Test that a false signature is not validated

testInvest().notice: Tests investment function call by user

testMultipleInvestmentsInSingleRound().notice: Tests that a user can invest multiple times in a single round within the user and round limits

testTooManyInvestmentsInSingleRound().notice: Tests that a user cannot invest multiple times in a single round to exceed their limits

testUserCantAddInvestmentRecord().notice: Tests that a non-admin cannot add an investment record

testValidateSignature().notice: Tests creation and validation of EIP712 signatures

testWithdrawPostInvestment().notice: Tests withdraw of ERC20 tokens by admin

documentation.text: @notice sets up project and payment tokens, and an instance of the investment ledger

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct VVVVCInvestmentLedger.InvestParams memory) view external returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@notice Tests creation and validation of EIP712 signatures
 @dev defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, and validates it with the same struct parameters

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct VVVVCInvestmentLedger.InvestParams memory) view external returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@notice Test that a false signature is not validated
 @dev defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, and validates it with different struct parameters

@notice Tests investment function call by user
 @dev defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, validates it, and invests some PaymentToken

@notice Tests investment function call by user with invalid signature
 @dev defines an InvestParams struct, creates a signature for it, changes a param and should fail to invest
@notice Tests withdraw of ERC20 tokens by admin
@notice Tests emission of VCInvestment event upon user investment
@notice Tests emission of VCInvestment event upon admin investment
@notice Tests addition of investment record by admin
@notice Tests that a non-admin cannot add an investment record
